998:6: yaḥ sarvadāparasukhaikaraso babhūva duḥkhena duḥkhamagamatparamaṃ pareṣām |
998:8: bicchi sāvayasi yasya śiraḥ parārtha sannayanapaṅkajatāmabāpa |
998:9: svārtha puna sitātapatrā pṛthvī babhūva niśiteva kṛpāṇadhārā ||4||
998:14: dharmāmbuvāha iva yo 'bhyudito hitāya dharmāmṛtaṃ jalamibaikarasaṃ babarṣa |
998:18: tajjāgaraṃ maraṇajanmajarāpahāri ye nāpnuvanti na pibanti na dhārayanti |
998:21: tacchāmanaṃ samadhigamya yadutsṛjanti mohasya tadvilasitaṃ paramāddhutasya ||10||
998:23: tuṅgāṃ prayānti padavīmanivartamānā bhumiṃ nijāmavataranti vivartamānāḥ ||11||
998:24: janmārṇabaṃ paramadustaramuttitīrṣuḥ śīlaplabaṃ ka iha hastagataṃ jahāti |
998:25: kāntāramadhyapatitaḥ kathamāryasāthīdaṣṭo na śocati ciraṃ supathānabhijñaḥ ||12||
998:27: muñcatti ye jinaguṇābalimantarāle begena te viṣamapātamadhaḥ patanti ||13||
998:28: ekākino 'pi manasā niyamaṃ prakalpya ye karmaṇā samuditena samunnayanti |
998:29: te sādhabo bhuvanamaṇḍalamaulibhūtāstaireva yānti gurutāṃ guravaḥ suśiṣyaiḥ ||14||
998:31: tejasvinaḥ sukhamasūnapi saṃtyajanti satyasthitivyasanino na punaḥ pratijñām ||15||
998:32: tiṣṭhantu tāvadiha sarvajanāpavādāḥ sarvāśca pāpagatayo nirayāśca ghorāḥ |
998:33: sadyo jahāti sahajāṃ prakṛti yadeṣa duḥkha tataḥ kimaparaṃ bhubi sajjanasya ||16||
998:34: yaḥ prapya nābamiba dharmamayīṃ biśālāṃ bhūyo jahāti padaṃvī munibhiḥ pralktṛptām |
998:37: so 'baśyameva taribaśaṃ masaḥ krameṇa sarvāḥ samāśca bisamāśca gatīḥ prayāti ||18||
998:39: āviśya garbhanilayaṃ nirayaṃ yathaiva duḥkhaṃ mahatsa sahate paripiṇḍatāṅgaḥ ||19||
998:40: kālakramena sa tato dṛḍhatailayantraniṣpīdryamāna iva yāti bhuvaṃ kathaṃcit |
998:41: sadyastathāpi yadayaṃ na jahāti jīvaṃ duḥkhopabhogagatidurlabhi tattadeva ||20||
998:46: sa tato'pi patatyacetanaḥ patito naiba jahāti bikriyām |
998:48: sa vihāya munīndrasevitaṃ supathaṃ yātyapathena mohitaḥ |
998:50: atha tasya balādanicchataḥ śirasi nyastapadā sunirdayam |
998:51: niśitaṃ palitāṅkuśaṃ jarā kariṇo hastipakīva yacchati ||25||
998:56: vidalanti tato 'sya sanvayo matirutkrāmati hīyate gatiḥ |
998:57: kṣayameti vapuḥ pariślaṣaṃ niyataṃ vardhata eva jīvitāśā ||28||
998:59: upagacchati yāmayaṃ daśāṃ narake sā yadi bhīma eva saḥ ||29||
998:60: kathamevamidaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ kathamevaṃ na kṛtaṃ hatā gatiḥ |
998:61: kathamevamayaṃ mayāstakaḥ śirasi nyastapado na lakṣitaḥ ||30||
998:65: vijahāti nijaṃ kaḍevaraṃ dayitaṃ yatnapareṇa rakṣitam ||32||
998:70: dūrānnirīkṣya vimalaṃ salilaṃ pipāsurabhyeti gāḍhatṛṣito yadayaṃ tadeva |
998:78: tāpārditasya dahanaṃ tu hitānilo'pi śotārditasya dahano 'pi karoti śītam |
998:81: aprāpta eva pṛthukaṇṭhadarīpra taśleṣmoṣmaṇā jalalavaḥ pariśoṣameti ||40
998:95: utpāṭayanti nayane sphurataḥ prasahya tatra sthitasya bakavāyasakaṅkagṛdhāḥ ||47||
998:96: teṣāṃ mukhaiḥ kuliśakoṭinibhaiḥ prasahya nidrāyamānavapureṣa kṛtārtanādaḥ |
998:107: ā cetaso jaḍataratvamupetakāyāstiṣṭhanti śītanarakeṣu bhṛśaṃ nadantaḥ ||53||
998:109: sitāsthisakalāṭalīracitabhūṣaṇaṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ pravṛttamiva bhairavaṃ sasujacarma hāhāravam ||54||
998:114: nirikṣya vivarāntaraṃ muḍurapāvṛtaṃ dūrataḥ prayānti kathamapyamī pramataduḥkhamokṣāśrayāḥ |
998:115: yadā tadapi ghaṭṛitaṃ bhavati karmapaṭṛrdṛḍhaistadā biphalavāñchitāḥ kimapi yānti duḥkhāntaram ||57||
998:120: te jantabo girinadījalalolajīvā auṣṭhyaṃ tadeva narakeṣu ta eva cāgniḥ |
998:121: karmāṇi tatkhalu tathā pariṇamayanti sarva yathā paramadāruṇamābibhāti ||60||
998:124: mleccheṣū vā narakapālasamavrateṣu tiryakṣu vā kṛtaparasparabhakṣaṇeṣū |
998:125: jātiṃ labheta yadi tatra tadeva śīlamāsevate patati yena punaḥ prapātam ||62||
998:127: cintāmaṇerapi samabhyadhikaṃ guṇaughairmānuṣyakaṃ ka iha tadviphalīkaroti ||63||
998:130: śvaḥ kāryametadidamadya paraṃ muḍūrtādetatkṣaṇāditi janena vicintyamāne |
998:133: narvaḥ prahṛṣyati jano na punarmamaitadāyuḥ prahīṇamiti yāti paraṃ viṣādam ||66||
998:139: kiṃ sā raviḥ suramaritsu biviktaramyatīrāsu yā śucijalāsu vane nadīṣu ||69||
998:140: viśālāḥ śailānāṃ viratajanasaṃpātasubhagā guhā gāḍhābhogā haritavanalekhāparikarāḥ |
998:141: sarittīrāsannā surajamadhurairnirjaravairna gamyāḥ lkeśāgnerayamiti vadantīva pathikān ||70||
998:142: māyāmarīcidakacandrataraṃgakalpāḥ kāmā jinena gaditā bibhavāḥ striyaśca |
998:143: svapnāntadurlabhitabibhramavipralabdhā bālāḥ patanti nirayeṣvapi yeṣu sattāḥ ||71||
998:144: āpātamāṃtramadhurā biṣayā biṣaśca ghorā viṣākakaṭukā biṣayā biṣaśca |
998:145: mohāndhakāragahanā biṣayā biṣaśca durvāravegacapalā viṣayā biṣaśca ||72||
998:146: kāmā viṣaśca biṣayāśca nitrupyamānāḥ śreyo viṣaṃ na viṣayā viṣamasvabhāvāḥ |
998:147: ekatra janmati viṣaṃ viṣatāṃ janmāntare'pi viṣayā viṣatāṃ prayānti ||73||
998:150: saṃsṛṣṭaṃ vrajati viṣaṃ biṣeṇa śantiṃ sanmantrairagadadharaiśca sādhyamānam |
998:151: yuktaṃ vā bhavati viṣaṃ hitāya nṝṇāṃ na tvevaṃ viṣayamahābiṣaṃ kadācit||75||
998:153: śvabhre patatyatha ca nāstu ta eva lābhastadvatsukhānvitamatiḥ khalu jīvalokaḥ ||76||
998:158: sparśe sukhāsu padapātanatonnatāsu merornitambapadabīṣu ciraṃ vihṛtya |
998:163: karmānilakulagatiḥ kugatiḥ prayāti ko nāma tatra puruṣo na bhayaṃ bhajeta ||81||
998:165: duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yadamarā maraṇe vrajanti tanmānavā na jalabudvudalolajīvāḥ ||82||
998:169: satvānāṃ bhavajaladhau parilputānāṃ matsyanāṃ baḍiśamivāntakena dattam ||84||
998:171: krodhāpūrṇeḥ subaḍubhirayomudraraistāḍyamānā manyate taṃ paramiva sukhaṃ nārakā yadvadeva ||85||
998:173: bhandībhūte kṣaṇamapi nije duḥsahe duḥkhabaḍnau sardho lokastanusukhalabagrāmatṛṣṇāṃ karoti ||86||
998:174: yāvadyābajjagati sakale jāyate saukhyasaṃjñā tīvattāvadvaḍutaraśikho jāyate rāgabaḍniḥ |
998:175: yāvadyabadvisarati śubhā bhāvanā bhāvyamānā tāvattāvadvahalataratāmeti mohāndhakāram ||87||
998:179: tasyānṛtasya phalamugramidaṃ kavīnāṃ tāsveva garbhanilayaṃ padamī biśanti ||89||
998:180: kā saugatirjagati yā śataśo na yātā kiṃ tatsukhaṃ yadaśakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ |
998:181: kāstāḥ śriyaścapalacāmaracāruhāsāḥ prāptā na yāstadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ ||90||
998:182: nadyo na tā na bihṛtaṃ pulineṣu yāsāṃ sthānaṃ na tajjagati yatra kṛto na vāsaḥ |
998:183: vyomnāpi tanna padamasti na yatra yātaṃ duṣpūraṇastadapi vardhata eva rāgaḥ ||91||
998:184: duḥkhaṃ na tadyadasakṛnna purānubhūtaṃ kāmā na te jagati yairiha tṛptirāsīt |
998:185: sattvo na so'sti jaṭhare śayitaṃ na yasya saṃsāriṇastadapi nāsti kathaṃ virāgaḥ ||92||
998:186: atyāyate jagati janmaparigrahe 'sminduḥkhe sukhe ca bahuśaḥ parivartamānaḥ |
998:187: nāsau jano jagati yo na babhūva bandhurdveṣoragastadapi tiṣṭhati bhīmabhogaḥ ||93||
998:188: yaiḥ sārdhametya hasitaṃ lalitaṃ pragītamekatra pītamaśitaṃ ca kṛtāśca goṣṭhyaḥ |
998:189: kālakrameṇa gamitāḥ kati ke'pi ramyā nītāḥ samāśca viṣamāśca daśāḥ kathaṃcit ||94||
998:191: saṃsārasāgaragatānapahāya bandhūnekaḥ prayāti yadi nāsti tataḥ kṛtaghnaḥ ||95||
998:192: aṅkasthitena śiśunā vivaśena yāsāṃ pītaḥ payodhararasaṃ praṇayānuyātaḥ |
998:194: yā saṃsthito'yamudare'pi kṛtāvakāśo yāḥ snehavilkavadhiyaḥ ślathamenamūḍuḥ |
998:195: tā duḥkhitā aśaraṇāḥ kṛpaṇā bihāya ko nāma śatrurapi gantumihotsaheta ||97||
998:196: bikīrṇe duḥkhaughairjagati vivaśe 'sminnaśaraṇe parārthe yaduḥkhaṃ tadiha sukhamāduḥ supuruṣāḥ |
998:197: kṣaṇaṃ kṣuttṛṣṇoṣṇaśramabigamarabhyanarucaḥ paraṃ kṛtvā teṣāmapi yadiha ka ivāsya pratisamaḥ ||98||
998:198: na sāramthairyā naiva ca nṛpatilakṣmīparikarairna dārairnāpatyairna surabhavane nāsuragatau |
998:199: kathaṃcitsaṃprāpyaṃ viṣayasukhaṃ bhogaparamairlabhante yā prītiṃ parahitasukhādhānaniratāḥ ||99||
998:200: svayaṃ ghāsagrāsaṃ paśurapi karotyeva sulabhaṃ yadṛcchā labdhaṃ vā pibati salilaṃ gāḍhatṛṣitaḥ |
998:201: parasyārtha kartu yadiha puruṣo'yaṃ prayatate tadasya svaṃ tejaḥ sukhamidamaho pauruṣamidam ||100||
998:202: yadālokaṃ kuvan bhramati raviraśrāntaturagaḥ sadālokaṃ dhatte yadagaṇitabhārā vasumatī |
998:203: naṃ sa svārthaḥ kaścitprakṛtiriyameva mahatāṃ yadete lokānāṃ hitasukharasaikāntarasikāḥ ||101||
998:205: sphuradvaḍnijvālā pramathitaśiroveṣṭananibhā yātante ye'trādruta iha puruṣāste sukṛtinaḥ ||102||
998:207: parārthe sphuṭanalinahāsāpi nalinī karotyeṣāṃ tāpaṃ ḍūtavahaśikhāsaṃhatiriva ||103||
998:210: aśaraṇajanatāraṇāya tīrṇāḥ punarapi vaitaraṇīṃ taranti dhīrāḥ |
998:212: iti sucaritarantaṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ śivamamṛtamudāraṃ bhāsuraṃ bhāsurāṇām |
998:213: asulabhamakṛtajñairnandanaṃ nandanānāṃ bhaja samasukhahetuṃ maṅgalaṃ maṃṅgalānām ||106||
998:214: sugatavacanapuṣpaṃ sarvadā sebanīyaṃ phalati phalamudāraṃ puṣpameva drumāṇām |
998:216: visṛja viṣayānnītyākīrṇāṃ kṣaṇabyayasaṅgino bhaja samasukhaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ kṛtāntabhayojkitam |
998:217: vikara timiraṃ mohabyājaṃ vimokṣayathārgalaṃ na khalu suciraṃ nidrāyante sadaśvakiśorakāḥ ||108||
998:218: vinayavisaro vīryaskandhaḥ kṣamāsamapalṝavaḥ śamathakusumaḥ prajñāśākhaḥ pradānaghanacchadaḥ |
998:219: praṇidhiśikharaḥ śīlacchāyaḥ praśāntiphalaprado bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahādrumaḥ ||109||
998:221: praśamitarajaḥ śīlacchāyāvibhūṣitabhūtalo bhava bhava marau tāpārtānāṃ tvamekamahāghanaḥ ||110||
998:224: iti tigadatā yadupārjitaṃ puṇyaṃ mayā kiyatsugatacarite kṛtvā śradvāmanena jano 'khilaḥ |
998:225: satatasukhito ramyābhogaḥ samṛdvamanorathaḥ parahitarataḥ sarvajñatvaṃ prayātu tataḥ śanaiḥ ||112||
998:227: śucisurabhayaḥ sphullāmbhojairbibhūṣitabhūmayo dadhatu narakāḥ sphītāṃ śobhāṃ saśīkaravāyavaḥ ||113||
998:228: bijitaṃbirutamārānīkāḥ kṛtābhayaghoṣaṇā gaganasalilakrīḍā ramyā sameta narāmarāḥ |
998:229: jananamaraṇalkeśāyāsaprabandhavighātino diśi diśi sadā budvotpādā bhavantu samīhitāḥ ||114||
998:230: bhavatu jagatāṃ dharmāmodaḥ prabandhamahotsavaḥ suciraguṇitā mṛtyorbandhyā bhavantu manorathāḥ |
998:231: munijanakathāgoṣṭhībandhaiḥ samābṛtavarṣibhiḥ satataśiśiraḥ subhagacandrālokaḥ prayātu kṛtārthatām ||115||
